data.actual_result: The log of the previous filter pops up for a second, and switches..
data.short_description: When changing the "filter by user" for audit log, your previous filter pops up for a second.
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to audit log, and go to filter by user. Choose a user who has made an audit log action. - Then, go back to the filtering, and switch to another user that has at least 1 audit log action.
